content: **crochet and felted drops seating pad with crochet square in snow ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no ee-560 yarn group e or c + c~ ---------------------------------------------------------- **measurements** before felting approx 53 x 53 cm / 21 x 21 measurements after felting approx 36 x 36 cm / 14 1/4 - x 14 1/4 **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 100 g color no 02 black 50 g color no 14 dark gray 50 g color no 46 medium gray 50 g color no 53 light gray 50 g color no 01 off white note seating pad worked with one color = 200 g eskimo drops crochet hook size 7 mm or size needed to get 10 double_crochet = width 10 cm / 4 one square measures approx 21 x 21 cm / 8 1/4 x 8 1/4 before felting
